Posts.Content: I know i just need to focus on whats happening now  but its the not knowing that scares me, but ive a great support system around me with my family and my boyfriend and his family and my friends and now this support group
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: The dr said mine is in the duct but its started to come out of it and that there are cancer cells in a few lymph nodes
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: Hi  Mine is also grade 3 drs say its 19mm by 13mm and that they have caught it early which is a good thing but because of my age and that i have no kids i have to see a fertility specialist to discuss freezing my eggs so that at a later stage i can think about having them, between that and the tests that need to happen before i see the ongologist, its alot to take in. But i do have a great support system and im just worried in case the ct scans and the mri shows it elsewhere but i know i need to stay positive until i see the ongologist
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: Do you mind if i can ask what stage was yours the dr has graded mine at grade 3 is that the same as stage 3 or is it different
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: The drs say mine is 19mm by 13mm grade 3, but they said they have caught it early, ive just had a ct scan and due to go for a mri on Wednesday but im worried if they tell me its spread x
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: I go to see my ongologist next friday to discuss treatment plan hopefully there he will will able to tell me what stage it is at, but before i start any treatment im going to see a fertility specialist to see about freezing my eggs as i was told chemo damages them, so that further down the line when i win my battle against cancer and when the time is right my bf and i can start talking about kids.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: Thanks i will, its just hard at the min because 18 months ago i lost my mum to cancer, she too had breast cancer then went into remission but sadly it came back and she lost her life to it, thats one of the things im scared about is that if i beat it, will it come back
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28

Posts.Content: I have just been diagnosed with grade 3 invasive ductal breast cancer at 28 and im scared
Posts.Title: Breast cancer at 28
